insult: Is your ass jealous of all the shit that comes out of your mouth?
If you were a vegetable, you'd be a cabbitch.
I don't exactly hate you but if you were on fire and I had water, I'd drink it.
I hope one day you choke on the shit you talk.
Bitch please, your birth certificate is an apology letter from the Condom Factory.
Life is full of disappointment and i just added you to the list.
Of course I talk like an idiot, how else would you understand me?
I treasure the time I don't spend with you.
You should introduce your upper lip to your lower lip sometime and shut up.
If I throw a stick, will you leave?
The trash get's picked up tomorrow. Be ready.
Who sprinkled the bitchy dust?
Go darling, buy a brain.
I'd agree with you but then we'd both be wrong.
Zombies eat brains. You're safe.
If ugliness was measured in bricks, you'd be the great wall of china.
Did you eat an extra bowl of stupid this morning?
Merry Kissmyass
Mirrors don't speak. Lucky for you, they don't laugh either.
Were you born on a highway? Because that's where most of the accidents happen.
I would love to insult you, but I'm afraid I won't do as well as nature did.
You're as useless as the "ueue" in "queue".
If I wanted to kill myself, I would climb up your ego and jump to your IQ.
If I had a dollar for every time you said something smart, I'd be broke.
When you were born, the doctor threw you out of the window and the window threw you back.
I like your approach. Now let's see your departure.
You are so fake that even China denied they made you!
